<js>
str1=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/小说/doulist");
str2=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/文学/doulist");
str3=java.ajax("https://m.douban.com/tag/历史/doulist");
str=String(str1+str2+str3);
reg1=/\d+(?=\?from_id)/gi;
reg2=/[^>]+(?=<\/h3>)/gi;
id=str.match(reg1);
name=str.match(reg2);
x="";
for (i=0;i<id.length;i++){
x+=name[i]+"::/doulist/"+id[i]+"?start={{(searchPage-1)*25}}&&"
}
result=x;
</js>

    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
